The video was originally posted on Janua: 2021, and has been viewed over 3,700 times.
The video shows Indonesian officials: including Social Affairs Minister Tri Rismaharini and Chief Security Minister Mahfud MD, dancing without masks. Home Affairs Minister Tito Karnavian is also seen singing.
The video: s caption in Indonesian translates to English as criticizing the officials for dancing without following health protocols while citizens are living in fear and facing restrictions.
A Google reverse image search using keyf: s news agency Antara on February 3, 2020. The video's title and caption indicate that it was recorded during a coordination meeting in January 2020, before the Covid-19 pandemic was declared.
